oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Accelerated spectral refinement - Part II: Cluster of eigenvalues
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: ALAM, R
KULKARNI, RP
LIMAYE, BV
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: rayleigh-schrodinger series
integral-operators
compact-operators
defect correction
banach-spaces
eigenelements
subspaces
elements
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The framework for accelerated spectral refinement for a simple eigenvalue developed in Part I of this paper is employed to treat the general case of a cluster of eigenvalues whose total algebraic multiplicity is finite. Numerical examples concerning the largest and the second largest multiple eigenvalues of an integral operator are given.
